attributes.action: Cold weather payments should go to DLA kids
attributes.additional_details:
The cold weather payment scheme is currently set up for £25 every seven day period of very cold weather between 1 November and 31 March but you have to be on ...

•Pension Credit
•Income Support
•income-based Jobseeker's Allowance
•income-related Employment and Support Allowance (ESA)

I feel that this is wrong and our children on high rate disability allowance should automatically be eligable too, such as kids with major heart defects need constant heating through out the cold months but yet they are not entitled to any help unless the above is claimed, even if their parent is on carers allowance no help is provided. Carers to DLA kids/ families end up with a much higher fuel bill than those who are eligable for the payments, Carera allowance should be included.

If you agree that DLA kids should automatically be included for cold weather payments please sign this petition.

Thank you for your support
